item.title: [TIP] Install Twonky on Asus WL-500W with stock firmware
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Asus WL-500W is a greate wi-fi router with lots of features, one of them being able to use it as a media server to serve movies/songs over your network from a hard disk connected directly to it through USB. But the media server that is included in the official firmware leaves a lot to be desired. If you are a fan of twonky, all you would have heard so far would have been that to use it on your router, you’d have to change your firmware over to a non-official one.
